The only drawback to this facility is that it needs a little updating
During our stay the pool was closed for renovation and the outdoor dining patio was closed for a private event
But they need to refurbish their interior especially of the rooms urgently
Although showing it is age the hotel still charges to dollar as renovations move forward at a snails pace
Under renovation so you will hear construction noise
Seems the Hyat made due with the renovations and are bending over backwards to accommodate the customers
Recent remodeling provides for nice rooms restaurant and lobby experience but it is the staff that truly make the difference as far as customer service

1: Rooms are nicely renovated and fresh and modern I got a decent rate too
Hotel was remodeled and I love it even more
Clean but needs to be updated

Worth a look when traveling to the roller coasters or business in the SC valley nice update to bar and ask if Reane is tending great friendly service all around and check out the happy hour too with live music on weekends
